alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 10:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rosebud County through 1045 PM MDT... At 1020 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Melstone, or 34 miles northwest of Hysham, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Rosebud County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
